name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an accomplished Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in deploying and managing scalable, distributed systems within the cloud ecosystem using **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **Helm**. My hands-on expertise includes establishing and enhancing **CI/CD pipelines** in **GitLab** and **Jenkins**, alongside monitoring and visualization tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana**. I have a robust foundation in **Linux** environments and relational database management systems, with proficiency in **MariaDB**, **MySQL**, and **Galera**.
Additionally, I utilize **Python** and **Shell** scripting for automation and incident management, ensuring seamless operations. I am adept at remote communication, fostering collaboration across teams to drive project success. My background in full-stack development with **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, as well as with **Azure** and **AWS**, allows me to create high-performance solutions tailored to the healthcare and financial sectors. I've successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities, ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
